title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving chains, agents and retrieval full access to Ollama-hosted models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that talks to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL with history, syntax highlighting and conversation management for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot (simonw/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub-Copilot-style code completions via Ollama models inside VS Code.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose examples for development and CI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive (WebFlux) support.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy that adds JWT auth, rate-limiting and usage logs in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting pipelines use Ollama for prompt, chat and embedding nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK providing strongly-typed client, dependency-injection helpers and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio async runtime, derive macros for chat roles and embedding batches.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app adding Ollama chat completions as a management command and async view.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm and Q&A using an Ollama backend.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama responses in threads with slash commands and DM support.

title: ollama-whatsapp
summary: WhatsApp bot via Twilio that answers questions using Ollama models with group or private chats.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama completions, image-captioning and model-switching to any Discord server.
